dict.string: YES PLEASE! BRING OVER MY CODE.
You should really complete the previous page first.
Before starting, you may bring some of your code over from the previous page.
**Remember:** The first item in an array is at index 0.
**Tip:** When working with [arrays](glossary://array) and [indexes](glossary://index), it can be helpful to get a pencil and paper and sketch the array with its items and their indexes.
